attributes.action: urgently begin development and manufacure of a vaccine/effective treatment against swine flu
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to direct the Department of Health to urgently and immediately start development, manufacture (and distribution to health centres and hospitals) of a vaccine or other effective treatment for the protection of all U.K citizens, against swine flu.

This is a matter of urgency, particularly as the W.H.O. are giving clear signals as to the potentially devastating effects of this disease. Please ask everyone you know to sign this petition, and suggest that they in turn pass this message on, in order to urge the Government to speedy action.  The Government have had early warning of this very real threat, and should not be seen to fail us in this matter.
